# zombie-movies
Database of zombie movies.


```{r import, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}

library(readr)
library(gt)

df <- read_csv("zombie-movies.csv")

df %>% 
    gt() %>% 
    cols_label(
        title = "Title",
        type = "Type",
        year = "Year",
        author = "Director"
    ) %>% 
    tab_style(
        cell_text(weight = "bold"),
        cells_column_labels()
    ) %>% 
    tab_options(
        container.overflow.y = TRUE,
        container.overflow.x = TRUE
    ) %>% 
    as_raw_html()
```
